entries.title: Government promises robust crypto regulation
entries.description: Proposals are being set out as scandals and tumbling values raise questions about the industry's future.

entries.title: Tech War: Biden moves to halt US exports to Huawei, reports say
entries.description: Washington has been tightening its rules on exports of US technology to China for several years.

entries.title: Green projects are boosting UK growth - CBI report
entries.description: Projects aimed at lowering carbon emissions are boosting growth in poorer parts of the country.

entries.title: How to add 'sizzle' to meat-free products
entries.description: Firms are creating artificial animal fats that they promise will make meat-free products taste better.
